member.name: READ_ELEMENT_ADDRESS_INFO
member.summary: Represents the volume tag information. It is used by theIOCTL_CHANGER_QUERY_VOLUME_TAGS control code.

summary.para: The number of elements matching criteria set forth by the ActionCode member of.
For information on compatibility with the current device, see the Features0 member of.

member.name: READ_ELEMENT_ADDRESS_INFO.ElementStatus
member.summary: An array of structures, one for each element that corresponded with the information passed in with the structure.
